item.title: Hacking together my first web app in Django
item.description: Background A few months ago I started my journey to build my first web app, Rental Tensor (excuse the horrible name ðŸ˜Ž) in order to estimate the rents for different properties at the zip code level. As a trained statistician disguised as a techy Data Scientist, I love playing with a mix of code and data, but I feel that it can sometimes be difficult for models or data pipelines to be very valuable without some sort of web backbone to host and serve it.
